content: **what you ll need ** 4 50mm 7 crochet hook 150yds worsted yarn 10ply - drops paris dark old pink tapestry needle **size ** changes for smaller/larger size adjustments are in *adult* headband circumference 20 51cm headband width 4 10cm **gauge ** 4 row x 4 stitches in single_crochet = 1 inch **stitches used ** st s - stitch es chain - chain stitch slip_stitch - slip_stitch single_crochet - single_crochet double_crochet double_crochet fptr2tog front post triple treble crochet 2 together
